text:
Too little music posted here… Why not take Tom Misch for a spin?
<https://open.spotify.com/album/28enuddLPEA914scE6Drvk?si=5YEIloVIQia6B3dmtC0rnw>

Couple artists out of the German speaking lands for ya:

<https://open.spotify.com/album/39DzAeC6SGLVpV93cbDhQb?si=th7w070fTKW7CxFpN24GnA>

And lou asril out of Vienna:

<https://open.spotify.com/album/4uC0kaSFr6xxuttwqIpuF2?si=flnYf82tSGaquDnzXuEItA>
oooo i like green flash. although i admit i’ve been bingeing old, old school with die hosen lately. wearing my Bis zum Bitteren Ende shirt right now…….
